00017 namespace reflection

00022 
00023         class REFLECTION_API accessor_member : public member
00024         {
00025         public:
00026 
00027                 template<class Deleg1, class Deleg2>
00028                 static accessor_member create(
00029                         const char* name, 
00030                         const Deleg1& delegGet, 
00031                         function_type* typeGet,
00032                         const Deleg2& delegSet, 
00033                         function_type* typeSet)
00034                 {
00035                         static_assert(sizeof(Deleg1) <= _deleg_buf_size, "Delegate buffer too small");
00036                         static_assert(sizeof(Deleg2) <= _deleg_buf_size, "Delegate buffer too small");
00037                         return accessor_member(name, (void*)&delegGet, typeGet, (void*)&delegSet, typeSet);
00038                 }
00039 
00040                 template<class Deleg>
00041                 static accessor_member create(
00042                         const char* name, 
00043                         const Deleg& delegGet, 
00044                         function_type* typeGet)
00045                 {
00046                         static_assert(sizeof(Deleg) <= _deleg_buf_size, "Delegate buffer too small");
00047                         return accessor_member(name, (void*)&delegGet, typeGet);
00048                 }
00049 
00050                 accessor_member(const char* name, 
00051                         void* delegGet, 
00052                         function_type* typeGet,
00053                         void* delegSet = 0,  
00054                         function_type* typeSet = 0);
00055 
00056                 void get_value(void* inst, void* buffer) const;
00057 
00058                 void set_value(void* inst, void* buffer) const;
00059 
00060                 bool is_read_only() const;
00061 
00062                 type* value_type() const;
00063 
00064                 virtual accessor_member* clone() const;
00065 
00066                 virtual void release();
00067 
00068         private:
00069                 class accessor_impl;
00070                 accessor_impl* m_impl;
00071 
00072                 accessor_member(accessor_impl* impl);
00073         };
00074 
00076 
00078 
00079         class accessor
00080         {
00081         public:
00082 
00083                 typedef accessor_member member_type;
00084                 static const EMemberType member_id = MEMBER_ACCESSOR;
00085 
00086                 accessor() : m_accessor(0), m_offset(0) { }
00087 
00088                 accessor(const accessor_member& acc, size_t offset) : m_accessor(&acc), m_offset(offset) { }
00089 
00090                 const char* get_name() const { return m_accessor->get_name(); }
00091 
00092                 void get_value(void* inst, void* buffer) const
00093                 {
00094                         m_accessor->get_value(adjustptr(inst, m_offset), buffer);
00095                 }
00096 
00097                 void set_value(void* inst, void* buffer) const
00098                 {
00099                         m_accessor->set_value(adjustptr(inst, m_offset), buffer);
00100                 }
00101 
00102         private:
00103                 const accessor_member* m_accessor;
00104                 size_t m_offset;
00105         };
